articles.author: Simon Robinson
articles.description: Inflation dropped in most economies around the world in 2024, but voters didn’t care.
articles.title: Inflation, elections and war dominated 2024

articles.author: Gram Slattery
articles.description: Trump's Truth Social post was an exceedingly rare example of a U.S. leader saying he could push a sovereign country to hand over territory.
articles.title: Trump says he might demand Panama hand over canal

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Six people were killed and others injured in an Israeli strike on a school sheltering displaced people in Gaza, the civil emergency service reported on Sunday.
articles.title: Six killed in Israeli strike on school sheltering displaced people in Gaza, civil emergency says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Tens of thousands of people gathered in central Belgrade on Sunday to protest against President Aleksandar Vucic and his ruling Serbian Progressive Party (SNS), whom they blame for a railway station roof collapse last month that killed 15 people.
articles.title: Tens of thousands gather in anti-government protest in Belgrade

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The suspect is a 50-year-old man from Saudi Arabia who has lived in Germany for almost two decades.
articles.title: Suspect in German Christmas market attack held on murder charges

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: At least one person died in the collapse, which happened as a city councilman who had complained about the bridge's problems was shooting video.
articles.title: Brazil bridge collapses, spilling sulfuric acid into river

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Ahmed al-Sharaa said no sects would be excluded.
articles.title: Syria's de facto ruler reassures minorities, meets Lebanese Druze leader

articles.author: Tuvan Gumrukcu
articles.description: Turkey's foreign minister said after meeting Syria's de facto leader in Damascus on Sunday that there was no room for Kurdish militants in Syria's future, calling for the YPG militia to disband.
articles.title: Turkish foreign minister says no room for Kurdish militants in Syria's future

articles.author: Lucy Craymer
articles.description: New Zealand said it could discuss independence.
articles.title: New Zealand rejects Cook Islands passport plan

articles.author: Yimou Lee, Angie Teo, Fabian Hamacher
articles.description: A Chinese war plane goes missing near Taiwan. China sends swarms of military boats and planes for a blockade as Taiwan goes on a war footing. Panic ensues on the streets of Taipei.
articles.title: Makers of Taiwan's 'Zero Day' TV series set around invasion fear backlash from China
